page.title: 02JACKDAW QUARRY
page.content: It's more than ten years since limestone was quarried by United Gravel from{Jackdaw Quarry}near Over Kellet but it is still a busy place, especially on hot days.The quarry has filled with water and in the summer it's like a free public swimming pool. On warm evenings as many as fifty children will be there.It's good for swimming because it's large and deep- some say{200 feet}deep.The water is reasonably clear and very blue.There are cliffs around the edge and children jump from them into the water.The quarry is also used as a dump,I once saw some divers pull a moterbike from the water and there is someone at school who says her brother's car is at the bottom of the quarry. Police divers and other groups use the quarry for training.
